title: How to Check for Updates for Windows 7

steps.title: Open the Start menu.
steps.content: Open the Start menu. This can be achieved by clicking the multicolored Windows 7 Start orb at the bottom-left of your screen.

steps.title: Open Control Panel
steps.content: Open Control Panel . Click Control Panel on the right column of Start.

steps.title: Go to "System and Security".
steps.content: Go to " System and Security ". Click on the green header.

steps.title: Open Windows Update.
steps.content: Open Windows Update. Choose " Windows Update " from the middle of the list.

steps.title: Check for updates.
steps.content: Check for updates. Click the Check for updates button on the main screen. If you don't see the button, click the "Check for updates" link in the left pane. It's towards the top.
